title: Easter nest cupcakes
ingredients: ['140g self-raising flour', '120g butter, softened', '85g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', 'Chocolate buttercream', '175g butter, softened', '125g cocoa powder', '600g icing sugar', '150ml milk', '1 drop vanilla extract', 'To decorate', '2 to 4 tablespoons chocolate sugar strands', '58 coloured mini chocolate eggs']
